hanzi-su-wiki:
階

Значения

Класс, разряд; этаж; лестница, ступени

Мнемоника

  • Ступени, они имеются на всех 皆 стенах 阝.

  • "Все 皆 находятся на верхнем этаже двухэтажного автобуса."

Варианты

阶, 堦

jiē
rank or step; stairs
ранг или ступенька; лестница

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 阶)
Pictophonetic: 皆 indicates the sound; 阝 (hill) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
階段 [ jiē duàn ]: stage; section; phase; period; Classifiers: 个
階級 [ jiē jí ]: (social) class; Classifiers: 个
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 阝 [ yì ] place, town, city
    • 皆 [ jiē ] all, every, everybody
heisig_chinese_memo: All buildings of The Pinnacle are multi-story like Hong Kong. Imagine how many stairs there are!
heisig_constituent: storey, pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, all, compare, spoon, sitting on the ground, white, dove, spoon2, sitting on the ground2
heisig_story: The story of this character refers to floors in a building. The elements: pinnacle . . . all.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: storey, stair, counter for storeys of a building
koohiiStory1: All buildings of The Pinnacle are multi-storey. They don´t have much room, so they have to build up. It sucks when someone presses all the buttons on the elevator! You have to stop at each storey!
koohiiStory2: Some stupid kid has pushed all the buttons in the elevator. As it stops at all storeys you reach a pinnacle of impatience. Finally you reach your storey, the last one, at the pinnacle of the building.
jp_example_words:
階(かい): -floor (counter), stories
階級(かいきゅう): class, rank, grade
階層(かいそう): class, level, stratum, hierarchy
段階(だんかい): gradation, grade, stage
階段(かいだん): stairs
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Look at a building and compare the white parts. Each of those white parts is a floor. Multi-story buildings have tons of different floors that you can see from the outside.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: All buildings have white marks that you can compare with the rest to see where the floors are.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You need to use your ability to tell where floors are from the outside of the building to find the story that lets kayaks (かい) in. You're coming from the side of the building surrounded by water, so you need to find the kayak floor to get in.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture this building and each of its floors. There should be one floor in particular with a waterfall coming out of it that you can climb with your kayak.
Ru_Meaning: storey, stair, counter for storeys of a building
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 皆 (みな、カイ все, всё). Не путать: 楷 (カイ образец, уставной стиль), 陛 (ヘイ высочество).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: everyone (皆) on the hill (⻖) is on the same floor
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I love to introduce the pinnacle to my friends but it's located high on top of a mountain so we have to walk up thousands of stairs to get there.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " 𨸏 ", " all " sound, the original meaning is step. "Said Wen": "Yeah. From 𨸏, all sounds." "Shu‧ Dayumo": "The emperor is born to apply Wende, dances dry feathers on two levels."

" Stage " can mean a ladder. "Book of Rites‧Song Daji": "If there is Linlu, the people will set up the steps, and if there is no Linlu, the people will set up the steps." Zheng Xuan's note: "The step, the person who is multiplied by the house...the step, the ladder."

" Rank " also means official rank and rank. "Han Shu·Kuang Heng Biography": "Plain Literature Kuang Heng has more talents and excellent Confucian classics, but it is a court without ranks, so the follow-up is far away.” Yan Shigu's note: “The rank is the promotion. The Perseverance, the one who is not urged."

" Level " also means relying and basis. "The Preface to the Formation of the Kings of Different Surnames in Han Dynasty": "It is the rank of Chitu after the death of the Han Dynasty, the tenure of one sword, and the emperor's career for five years.

" Rank " also means to climb and ascend. "The Analects of Confucius-Zizhang": "It is impossible to rise to the sky."

" Stage " also indicates the cause and way. "Yi‧XiCi": "The words that are born from chaos are steps." Kong Yingdashu: "Steps, which are steps. The steps that are born from words are chaotic, and words are used as steps."
humanum_short_description_en: From " 𨸏 ", " all " sound, the original meaning is step.
humanum_full_description:
從「𨸏」，「皆」聲，本義為臺階。《說文》：「陛也。从𨸏，皆聲。」 《書‧大禹謨》：「帝乃誕敷文德，舞干羽于兩階。」

　　「階」可表示梯子。《禮記‧喪大記》：「復有林麓則虞人設階，無林麓則狄人設階。」鄭玄注：「階，所乘以升屋者……階，梯也。」

　　「階」也表示官階、品級。《漢書‧匡衡傳》：「平原文學匡衡材智有餘，經學絕倫，但以無階朝廷，故隨牒在遠方。」顏師古注：「階謂升次也。隨牒，謂隨選補之恆牒，不被招擢者。」

　　「階」還表示憑藉、根據。《漢書‧异姓諸侯王表序》：「是以漢亡尺土之階，繇一劍之任，五載而成帝業。」

　　「階」也表示攀登、升登。《論語‧子張》：「猶天之不可階而升也。」

　　「階」還表示緣由、途徑。《易‧繫辭上》：「亂之所生也，則言語以為階。」孔穎達疏：「階，謂梯也。言亂之所生，則由言語以為亂之階梯也。」

①爲了便於上下，用磚石砌成的或就山勢鑿成的梯形的道：階除(臺階)。階墀(臺階)。階級。階下囚。臺階。
②等級，層次：階層。官階。軍階。音階。
③憑藉：階緣(憑藉，依附)。
④由來：階禍。
⑤途徑：階段。

從「 𨸏 」，「 皆 」聲，本義為臺階。《說文》：「陛也。从𨸏，皆聲。」 《書‧大禹謨》：「帝乃誕敷文德，舞干羽于兩階。」 「 階 」可表示梯子。《禮記‧喪大記》：「復有林麓則虞人設階，無林麓則狄人設階。」鄭玄注：「階，所乘以升屋者……階，梯也。」 「 階 」也表示官階、品級。《漢書‧匡衡傳》：「平原文學匡衡材智有餘，經學絕倫，但以無階朝廷，故隨牒在遠方。」顏師古注：「階謂升次也。隨牒，謂隨選補之恆牒，不被招擢者。」 「 階 」還表示憑藉、根據。《漢書‧异姓諸侯王表序》：「是以漢亡尺土之階，繇一劍之任，五載而成帝業。」 「 階 」也表示攀登、升登。《論語‧子張》：「猶天之不可階而升也。」 「 階 」還表示緣由、途徑。《易‧繫辭上》：「亂之所生也，則言語以為階。」孔穎達疏：「階，謂梯也。言亂之所生，則由言語以為亂之階梯也。」
From " 𨸏", " all" sound, the original meaning is step. "Said Wen": "Yeah. From 𨸏, all sounds." "Shu‧ Dayumo": "The emperor is born to apply Wende, dances dry feathers on two levels." " Stage" can mean a ladder. "Book of Rites‧Song Daji": "If there is Linlu, the people will set up the steps, and if there is no Linlu, the people will set up the steps." Zheng Xuan's note: "The step, the person who is multiplied by the house...the step, the ladder." " Rank" also means official rank and rank. "Han Shu·Kuang Heng Biography": "Plain Literature Kuang Heng has more talents and excellent Confucian classics, but it is a court without ranks, so the follow-up is far away.” Yan Shigu's note: “The rank is the promotion. The Perseverance, the one who is not urged." " Level" also means relying and basis. "The Preface to the Formation of the Kings of Different Surnames in Han Dynasty": "It is the rank of Chitu after the death of the Han Dynasty, the tenure of one sword, and the emperor's career for five years. " Rank" also means to climb and ascend. "The Analects of Confucius-Zizhang": "It is impossible to rise to the sky." " Stage" also indicates the cause and way. "Yi‧XiCi": "The words that are born from chaos are steps." Kong Yingdashu: "Steps, which are steps. The steps that are born from words are chaotic, and words are used as steps."

階字的基本解释

階
jiē
见“阶”。

階字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiē］
［《廣韻》古諧切，平皆，見。］
亦作“堦1”。“阶1”的繁体字。
(1)台阶。
(2)攀登；升登。
(3)上达，到达。
(4)梯子。
(5)官阶，品级。
(6)凭借；根据。
(7)缘由，途径。
(8)谓导致，招致。

階字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【阜字部】　階； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1357第09
【唐韻】古諧切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】居諧切，?音皆。【說文】陛也。【玉篇】登堂道也，級也。【書·大禹謨】舞干羽于兩階。　又【釋名】階，梯也，如梯之有等差也。【禮·喪大記】復有林麓，則虞人設階。無林麓，則狄人設階。【註】階，所乗以升屋者，梯也。　又【易·繫辭】言語以爲階。【詩·大雅】誰生厲階。　又【禮·少儀】不得階主。【註】階，上進者。【疏】階是等級。人升階，必上進，故以階爲上進。　又星名。【前漢·東方朔傳】願?泰階六符。【註】泰階，三台也。　又官階。【南史·張融傳】融不知階級，階級亦可不知融。【唐書·百官志】文階二十八階，武階二十一階。　又烏階，草名。【爾雅·釋草註】欔，一名烏階。　又州名。【韻會】西戎別種，白馬氐地，魏武州，唐攺階州。　又叶居夷切，音基。【詩·小雅】彼何人斯，居河之麋。無拳無勇，職爲亂階。又【大雅】懿厥哲婦，爲梟爲鴟。婦有長舌，維厲之階。　又叶堅奚切，音稽。【班固·西都賦】雖輕迅與僄狡，猶愕眙而不能階。攀井幹而未半，目眴轉而

[①]［jiē］
["Guangyun" ancient harmony cut, all in common, see. ]
Also known as "堦1". Traditional characters for "level 1".
(1) Steps.
(2) Climbing; ascending.
(3) Go up and arrive.
(4) Ladder.
(5) Official rank and grade.
(6) Rely on; basis.
(7) Reason and way.
(8) Said to cause, to incur.

jiē
вм. 阶

階

Значения

Класс, разряд; этаж; лестница, ступени

Мнемоника

  • Ступени, они имеются на всех 皆 стенах 阝.

  • "Все 皆 находятся на верхнем этаже двухэтажного автобуса."

Варианты

阶, 堦

Radicals: 阝, 比, 白  (building, compare, white)
Meaning Mnemonic
Look at a building and compare the white parts. Each of those white parts is a floor. Multi-story buildings have tons of different floors that you can see from the outside.
All buildings have white marks that you can compare with the rest to see where the floors are.
Reading Mnemonic
You need to use your ability to tell where floors are from the outside of the building to find the story that lets kayaks (かい) in. You're coming from the side of the building surrounded by water, so you need to find the kayak floor to get in.
Picture this building and each of its floors. There should be one floor in particular with a waterfall coming out of it that you can climb with your kayak.

阡, 比 (сравнивать), 白 (белый)
Фонетик: 皆 (みな、カイ все, всё). Не путать: 楷 (カイ образец, уставной стиль), 陛 (ヘイ высочество).
